character.noteList: Half-Elf Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Immune to magical sleep, advantage on saves vs charmed Noble Feature: • You can secure an audience with a local noble • Inspire an ally within 60 feet, giving them a bonus 1d6 on one ability check, attack roll, or save (Cha mod per day) ⊠Light Armor ⊠Simple Weapons, Hand Crossbows, Longswords, Rapiers, Shortswords ⊠One type of gaming set Any three musical instruments ⊠Common Elvish Extra Language One Extra Language ⊠leather armor unarmed strike dagger diplomat's pouch any musical instrument set of fine clothes signet ring scroll of pedigree purse ⊠⊠Bard 1⊠Variant⊠Noble⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Simon Dale⊠Bard 1⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠25⊠0⊠0
